short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifies you if there are EuroBonus offers on the current website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EuroBonus Assistant is an extension for more efficiently getting EuroBonus points while shopping. It aggregates offers from different sources and shows the relevant ones for the website you're visiting. With a simple selection of the offer you'd like to use, it sends you to the offering website such as ViaTrumf or FlySAS for you to register before you start shopping. Does not require any invasive permissions.
